body:
I'm getting an error when trying to produce the sky visualizations in the "watch the sky" example file. The EmbryoViz component give's a "1. Path must be a valid location" error. The gif it is trying to reference is 0kb.

It seems the conversion to .gif is failing. I'm struggling to trouble shoot this one.

attachments.name: Path must be a valid location error.jpg

topic: Error on Watch the Sky example file
